title: Local networks, not silver bullets, will sustain local news
description: For years, we’ve all waited for a savior for local news — a billionaire investor, philanthropy, the next app. But one thing has become clearer with time: While we tend to look further afield, the best answers were right here at home. In 2026, the solutions will be local. Across the country, people and communities...

In 2026, the solutions will be local. Across the country, people and communities...
